SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT ATXL_ATXT_CODE, ATXL_LANGUAGE FROM :1 WHERE ATXL_ATXT_CODE = :2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 10 ROWS
